packages.name: Dominus Esports (Paintable)
packages.author: Famiy
packages.description: You are able to change the primary and secondary colors in your garage. For more paint options (i.e. black/white primary) you can also change those two colors through Alpha Console. For most of my decals your are also able to change a third color by picking a color in the dropdown menu to the right of the 'Decal' type.

packages.name: Dominus Esports (Main body, Fully Colored)
packages.author: Famiy
packages.description: his pack includes 6 full color Esports decals for Dominus. You'll need to equip the decal called Dominus: Main Body Only and pick the skin you want from the Main Body dropdown box.

packages.name: Jon Sandman
packages.author: Butthead
packages.description: Jon Sandman Decal for Octane. Please remember to also equip the Octane: Sandman in Decals + the Octane: Sandman (Main Body) in Main Body Decals.
